text: Nicholas Donnelly (1938 â€“ January 2022) was a British actor. He was best known for his roles as Grange Hill as Mr. Craig MacKenzie]from 1985 to 1993, and as Sergeant Johnny Wills in police series Dixon of Dock Green from 1960 to 1976. He was born in London.
